caption.p: The geographic locations of the 11 ethnic populations in China. dq: Di-Qiang ancient group; bp: Baipu ancient group; by: Baiyue ancient group; m: Mongolian group; TB: Tibeto-Burman sublanguage family; MK: Mon-Khmer sublanguage family; D: Daic sublanguage family; M: Mongolian sublanguage family.
